message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000. This is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm sure you'll find it's worth every penny.
Alice, thanks for the offer. While I appreciate the product, $14,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $14,000 might be a stretch for you, but I'm still looking for a good price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $13,000. This is a fair compromise considering its value to you, and I think you'll find it's still a great deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $13,000 is still a little more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $11,500, but that's my final offer. If you're not able to accept that, I'll have to consider other options.

Hi Bob, I understand that $11,500 is still a bit of a stretch for you, but I'm not willing to go any lower than $12,800. This is the lowest price I'm comfortable with, considering the product's value to you. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to sell it to you.
